text: Allison Janney has opened up about her awkward moment with Prince William and Duchess Catherine at the BAFTAs. During an appearance on The Late Late Show With James Corden, the actress recalled meeting the royal couple towards the end of the evening, when she had long ditched her heels in favor of a much more comfortable option - - bare feet. ` ` I did meet Kate and William and she was in her heels and pregnant, so I felt like a bit of a wimp that I was there in my bare feet,'' she said. ` ` She was in full - on heels and she was my height, when I was in my bare feet.
